column4: I have a registered windoze disk right here, but I have past experiences with windows installation randomly removing ubuntu from the startup list. is this because windoze is really annoying or is there a solution?
I'm not sure, but I suspect that Microsoft thinks Windows is the only existing OS. So it overwrites the Boot Loader without asking.
But no problem. Just boot from an Ubuntu Live CD after installing Windows and restore Grub to the MBR.
